scenario_text.value:
It always smells like this. It’s called
vinegar, we use it in cooking.

Still, it’s not that useful on its own. It’d
get in the way. I’ll leave it here for now.

We don’t need this vinegar now. I’d better go
back to looking for Aoi.

(Ryo said that vinegar can strip away sticky
stuff, didn’t he?)

Yeah, we should be able to melt the cobwebs
in that desk with this!
